text: Idris Sardi (June 7, 1938 â€“ April 28, 2014) was an Indonesian violinist. His career lasted for nearly 50 years until retiring in 2013 because of ill health. Sardi was born to Mas Sardi, an Indonesian composer, and Hadidjah, an Indonesian actress. Sardi died at Meilia Hospital in Cibubur, Indonesia from an illness. He was 75 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Indonesian people Category:Violinists
title: Idris Sardi
